comment: /**  * Access the {@link WebServer}.  * @return the embedded web server  */
code: /**  * Access the {@link WebServer}.  * @return the embedded web server  */ public WebServer getWebServer() {     return getSource(). }

comment: /**  * Access the application context that the server was created in. Sometimes it is  * prudent to check that this matches expectations (like being equal to the current  * context) before acting on the server itself.  * @return the applicationContext that the server was created from  */
code: /**  * Access the application context that the server was created in. Sometimes it is  * prudent to check that this matches expectations (like being equal to the current  * context) before acting on the server itself.  * @return the applicationContext that the server was created from  */ public abstract WebServerApplicationContext getApplicationContext().

comment: /**  * Access the source of the event (an {@link WebServer}).  * @return the embedded web server  */
code: /**  * Access the source of the event (an {@link WebServer}).  * @return the embedded web server  */ @Override public WebServer getSource() {     return (WebServer) super.getSource(). }
